radiographic_examinations.findings: Single intrauterine gestational sac containing a normal fetus with a normal heart rate, area of nuchal translucency was 3.7 mm, two cysts within the left ovary (a clear cyst, 4.1 cm, and an endometrioma, 4.5 cm).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up ultrasound demonstrated a regular fetal heartbeat and fluid within the fetal stomach, but bilateral nuchal hygromas were noted.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Amniotic fluid karyotype was 46,XY, add(18)(p11.2), indicating additional material on the short arm of chromosome 18 at band 11.2.
Intrauterine pregnancy confirmed with a fetal heart rate of 111 beats per minute and normal interval growth.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up ultrasound at eight weeks confirmed normal fetal heart rate of 153 beats per minute and observed normal growth.
